verses.text: The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came again unto me, saying ,
Son of man , there were two women , the daughters of one mother :
And they committed whoredoms in Egypt ; they committed whoredoms in their youth : there were their breasts pressed , and there they bruised the teats of their virginity.

And the names of them \add were\add* Aholah the elder , and Aholibah her sister : and they were mine, and they bare sons and daughters. Thus \add were\add* their names ; Samaria \add is\add* Aholah , and Jerusalem Aholibah.\f + \fr 23.4 \ft Aholah: that is, His tent, or, tabernacle\f*\f + \fr 23.4 \ft Aholibah: that is, My tabernacle in her\f*
And Aholah played the harlot when she was mine ; and she doted on her lovers , on the Assyrians \add her\add* neighbours ,
\add Which were\add* clothed with blue , captains and rulers , all of them desirable young men , horsemen riding upon horses.

Thus she committed her whoredoms with them, with all them \add that were\add* the chosen men of Assyria , and with all on whom she doted : with all their idols she defiled herself.\f + \fr 23.7 \ft committed…: Heb. bestowed her whoredoms upon them\f*\f + \fr 23.7 \ft the chosen…: Heb. the choice of the children of Asshur\f*
Neither left she her whoredoms \add brought\add* from Egypt : for in her youth they lay with her, and they bruised the breasts of her virginity , and poured their whoredom upon her.
Wherefore I have delivered her into the hand of her lovers , into the hand of the Assyrians , upon whom she doted.

These discovered her nakedness : they took her sons and her daughters , and slew her with the sword : and she became famous among women ; for they had executed judgment upon her.\f + \fr 23.10 \ft famous: Heb. a name\f* \p

And when her sister Aholibah saw \add this\add*, she was more corrupt in her inordinate love than she, and in her whoredoms more than her sister in \add her\add* whoredoms.\f + \fr 23.11 \ft she was…: Heb. she corrupted her inordinate love more than, etc\f*\f + \fr 23.11 \ft more than…: Heb. more than the whoredoms of her sister\f*
She doted upon the Assyrians \add her\add* neighbours , captains and rulers clothed most gorgeously , horsemen riding upon horses , all of them desirable young men.
Then I saw that she was defiled , \add that\add* they \add took\add* both one way ,
And \add that\add* she increased her whoredoms : for when she saw men pourtrayed upon the wall , the images of the Chaldeans pourtrayed with vermilion ,
Girded with girdles upon their loins , exceeding in dyed attire upon their heads , all of them princes to look to , after the manner of the Babylonians of Chaldea , the land of their nativity :
And as soon as she saw them with her eyes , she doted upon them, and sent messengers unto them into Chaldea.\f + \fr 23.16 \ft as soon…: Heb. at the sight of her eyes\f*

And the Babylonians came to her into the bed of love , and they defiled her with their whoredom , and she was polluted with them, and her mind was alienated from them.\f + \fr 23.17 \ft Babylonians: Heb. children of Babel\f*\f + \fr 23.17 \ft alienated: Heb. loosed, or, disjointed\f*
So she discovered her whoredoms , and discovered her nakedness : then my mind was alienated from her, like as my mind was alienated from her sister.
Yet she multiplied her whoredoms , in calling to remembrance the days of her youth , wherein she had played the harlot in the land of Egypt.
For she doted upon their paramours , whose flesh \add is as\add* the flesh of asses , and whose issue \add is like\add* the issue of horses.
Thus thou calledst to remembrance the lewdness of thy youth , in bruising thy teats by the Egyptians for the paps of thy youth. \p

¶ Therefore, O Aholibah , thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will raise up thy lovers against thee, from whom thy mind is alienated , and I will bring them against thee on every side ;

The Babylonians , and all the Chaldeans , Pekod , and Shoa , and Koa , \add and\add* all the Assyrians with them: all of them desirable young men , captains and rulers , great lords and renowned , all of them riding upon horses.

And they shall come against thee with chariots , wagons , and wheels , and with an assembly of people , \add which\add* shall set against thee buckler and shield and helmet round about : and I will set judgment before them, and they shall judge thee according to their judgments.

And I will set my jealousy against thee, and they shall deal furiously with thee: they shall take away thy nose and thine ears ; and thy remnant shall fall by the sword : they shall take thy sons and thy daughters ; and thy residue shall be devoured by the fire.
They shall also strip thee out of thy clothes , and take away thy fair jewels.\f + \fr 23.26 \ft fair…: Heb. instruments of thy decking\f*
Thus will I make thy lewdness to cease from thee, and thy whoredom \add brought\add* from the land of Egypt : so that thou shalt not lift up thine eyes unto them, nor remember Egypt any more.

For thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will deliver thee into the hand \add of them\add* whom thou hatest , into the hand \add of them\add* from whom thy mind is alienated :

And they shall deal with thee hatefully , and shall take away all thy labour , and shall leave thee naked and bare : and the nakedness of thy whoredoms shall be discovered , both thy lewdness and thy whoredoms.
I will do these \add things\add* unto thee, because thou hast gone a whoring after the heathen , \add and\add* because thou art polluted with their idols.
Thou hast walked in the way of thy sister ; therefore will I give her cup into thine hand.
Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Thou shalt drink of thy sister’s cup deep and large : thou shalt be laughed to scorn and had in derision ; it containeth much.
Thou shalt be filled with drunkenness and sorrow , with the cup of astonishment and desolation , with the cup of thy sister Samaria.

Thou shalt even drink it and suck \add it\add* out , and thou shalt break the sherds thereof, and pluck off thine own breasts : for I have spoken \add it\add*, saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast forgotten me, and cast me behind thy back , therefore bear thou also thy lewdness and thy whoredoms. \p

¶ The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* said moreover unto me; Son of man , wilt thou judge Aholah and Aholibah ? yea, declare unto them their abominations ;\f + \fr 23.36 \ft judge: or, plead for\f*

That they have committed adultery , and blood \add is\add* in their hands , and with their idols have they committed adultery , and have also caused their sons , whom they bare unto me, to pass for them through \add the fire\add*, to devour \add them\add*.
Moreover this they have done unto me: they have defiled my sanctuary in the same day , and have profaned my sabbaths.
For when they had slain their children to their idols , then they came the same day into my sanctuary to profane it; and, lo, thus have they done in the midst of mine house.

And furthermore , that ye have sent for men to come from far , unto whom a messenger \add was\add* sent ; and, lo, they came : for whom thou didst wash thyself, paintedst thy eyes , and deckedst thyself with ornaments ,\f + \fr 23.40 \ft to come: Heb. coming\f*
And satest upon a stately bed , and a table prepared before it, whereupon thou hast set mine incense and mine oil.\f + \fr 23.41 \ft stately: Heb. honourable\f*

And a voice of a multitude being at ease \add was\add* with her: and with the men of the common sort \add were\add* brought Sabeans from the wilderness , which put bracelets upon their hands , and beautiful crowns upon their heads.\f + \fr 23.42 \ft of the…: Heb. of the multitude of men\f*\f + \fr 23.42 \ft Sabeans: or, drunkards\f*
Then said I unto \add her that was\add* old in adulteries , Will they now commit whoredoms with her, and she \add with them\add*?\f + \fr 23.43 \ft whoredoms…: Heb. her whoredoms\f*
Yet they went in unto her, as they go in unto a woman that playeth the harlot : so went they in unto Aholah and unto Aholibah , the lewd women. \p

¶ And the righteous men , they shall judge them after the manner of adulteresses , and after the manner of women that shed blood ; because they \add are\add* adulteresses , and blood \add is\add* in their hands.

For thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will bring up a company upon them, and will give them to be removed and spoiled.\f + \fr 23.46 \ft to be…: Heb. for a removing and spoil\f*

And the company shall stone them with stones , and dispatch them with their swords ; they shall slay their sons and their daughters , and burn up their houses with fire.\f + \fr 23.47 \ft dispatch…: or, single them out\f*
Thus will I cause lewdness to cease out of the land , that all women may be taught not to do after your lewdness.
And they shall recompense your lewdness upon you, and ye shall bear the sins of your idols : and ye shall know that I \add am\add* the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
